name: Time Warriors (itch) (Jerec12)
description:
STORY

In the year 2200 the world has been at peace for over a century, conflict is all but eradicated and society is by almost all measures a utopia. But there are those who think the peace makes us weak, and that when conflict does inevitably arrive from the stars we will be unprepared. 

The ideological extremists known as Ares (named after the greek god of war) clad gold armour and use a time machine to return to the past and influence events, in hopes of a butterfly effect that will make a more gruff and violent society.

As the futures greatest warrior, its up to you to stop them and save your timeline from eradication.

Controls

Time warriors is a classic RPG in the same vein as Pokemon. It is controlled entirely with the mouse, by clicking on commands that will cause your player to take actions and harm the enemy. The goal of the game is to reduce the enemy to 0 before you do, by selecting the right actions in the right sequence.

Actions

  • Attack: This is a standard attack that will deal 100 damage, and grant you a skill point
  • Guard: This guards you against the enemies next attack, this will reduce the incoming damage by 50% and grant you a skill point
  • Skills: Will open the skills menu which gives you access to Skills
  • Restores: Will open the restores menu which gives you access to Restores

Skills

  • Light attack: Deal 200 damage for the cost of 2 skill points
  • Heavy attack: Deal 400 damage at the cost of 4 skill points
  • Counter attack: Deal 600 damage at the cost of 6 skill points

Restores

  • Health Restore: Restore 500 health (50%) at the cost of 3 skill points
  • SP Restore: Restore 2 skill points, at the cost of your action.

Minimum System Specs:

OS: Windows 10

Memory: 2gb Ram

Storage: 50mb Available space
